Package org.slim3.controller.validator

This package provides validation feature.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Validator An interface to validate an input value.
 

Class Summary
AbstractValidator An abstract class to validate an input value.
ByteTypeValidator A validator for a byte value.
DateTypeValidator A validator for a date value.
DoubleRangeValidator A validator for double range check.
DoubleTypeValidator A validator for a double value.
Errors The error messages.
FloatTypeValidator A validator for a float value.
IntegerTypeValidator A validator for an integer value.
LongRangeValidator A validator for long range check.
LongTypeValidator A validator for a long value.
MaxlengthValidator A validator for maximum length check.
MinlengthValidator A validator for minimum length check.
NumberTypeValidator A validator for a number value.
RequiredValidator A validator for a required value.
ShortTypeValidator A validator for a short value.
Validators A class to control validation process.
 

Package org.slim3.controller.validator Description

This package provides validation feature.
